name: Wodinw 1998
description:
Dive into 1998 and hack into your enemies computer!
Complete minigames, talk to your helper AI "Mr Smiley", fight anti viruses, get through app securities and fight [REDACTED]

Code/Script: HmanHere

Art/Direction: BountyHat

Music/SFX:  Alexander Petshaft

Controls:

Left click and hold the blue top parts of windows to move them!

Right click blue top parts of windows to delete the window

Enter in text boxes to submit

Escape in text boxes to leave them
